short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TheTab.Ninja extension is a launchpage for each new tab and it allows you to manage your bookmarks and tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TheTab.Ninja extension transforms your browsing experience by creating a customized launch page every time you open a new tab. It gives you complete control over your bookmarks and tabs, making it easier to organize, save, and manage them efficiently. Whether you're working on multiple projects, gathering resources, or just keeping your favorite websites within reach, TheTab.Ninja simplifies your workflow by putting everything at your fingertips. With its intuitive interface, you can quickly access, categorize, and revisit your bookmarks and open tabs whenever needed. Say goodbye to clutter and enjoy a smoother, more organized browsing experience with TheTab.Ninja!
